title: 50: OBITCH meet us in the hotel lobby...
description:
Oh hello Geoffs! This week we’ve got quite the show, from the truth behind those darn Vikings we’re always talking about, to what happens when somebody kicks the bucket in a hotel room! We’ve got an obituary for a wise guy, and one that we adore, and of course we’ve got some dumbass criminalsssss! 


SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz

Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
Sponsors: 
Apostrophe: apostrophe.com/obit code ‘obit’ to save $15 off your first visit with an apostrophe provider! 
Storyworth: storyworth.com/obit to save $10 on your purchase!
Reel: reelpaper.com/obit or enter promo code obit to get 30% off your first order + free shipping! 
Athena Club: Geoffs get 20% off your first order at athenaclub.com with promo code ‘obit’ ! 

Sources:
https://www.kctv5.com/2022/05/17/looking-poopetrator-wichita-police-say-woman-destroyed-8-wigs-store-defecation/ https://www.georgiaclean.com/3-things-that-will-surprise-you-about-hotel-room-deaths/ https://www.quora.com/What-happens-when-someone-dies-in-a-hotel https://www.huffpost.com/entry/what-is-the-protocol-when_b_6970736 https://www.natgeokids.com/uk/discover/history/general-history/10-facts-about-the-vikings/ https://historycollection.com/16-facts-about-the-brutality-of-viking-life/5/ https://www.factinate.com/people/30-facts-about-vikings/ https://www.vikingsbrand.co/blogs/norse-news/the-death-and-the-afterlife-in-norse-mythology https://www.dkfindout.com/us/history/vikings/viking-longship/ https://www.joincake.com/blog/viking-funeral/#:~:text=Ancient%20Norse%20funerals%20for%20free%20men%20and%20women,funeral%20was%20usually%20cremation%20on%20a%20funeral%20pyre https://www.ilovephilosophy.com/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=181710 https://www.oddee.com/ww2-veteran-receives-license-to-be-buried-in-chewing-gum-coffin-54319/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

Oh hello Geoffs! This week we’ve got quite the show, from the truth behind those darn Vikings we’re always talking about, to what happens when somebody kicks the bucket in a hotel room! We’ve got an obituary for a wise guy, and one that we adore, and of course we’ve got some dumbass criminalsssss! 


SEE US LIVE IN IRVINE ON AUGUST 4TH: https://tinyurl.com/3fvwbsnz

Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram. 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807
Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast
